name: Mik
description:
GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT

Mik is a dark FPS/jump and run/story game created by Me.
Features:

-Singelplayer-story!
It is a Story about a prisoner trying to escape a underground facility in a futuristic world with beautiful models and detailed levels.
Currently there are 4 levels with a great story.
A robot which talks to you.

-Post Processing

Things that will be added soon:


-Bigger Singelplayer Story
